entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a
